welcome: Welcome to the Trans Resource Messaging Service! If you need to talk to someone who understands, text TALK. To find legal resources, text LEGAL. To get inspired, text GLITTER.
repeat: I did not understand that. Please text TALK, LEGAL, or GLITTER.
talk: Visit https://www.translifeline.org/ to talk to other transgender folks who are trained to provide support and empathy to you.
legal: The Transgender Law Center can get you started at https://transgenderlawcenter.org/.
